name: Web-Data-Administrator
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: The Web Data Administrator is a utility program implemented in ASP.NET that enables you to easily manage your SQL Server data wherever you are.

matches.name: GHDB: intitle:"Web Data Administrator - Login" +"Please enter your SQL Server credentials"
matches.ghdb: intitle:"Web Data Administrator - Login" +"Please enter your SQL Server credentials"

matches.name: default form html
matches.text: <form name="WebForm1" method="post" action="Default.aspx" onsubmit="javascript:return WebForm_OnSubmit();" id="WebForm1">
